<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Combat Grab](/Feats.aspx?ID=366) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
<trait label="Press" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=133" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 146 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=127) (Level 4), [Zombie](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=182) (Level 4)

**Requirements**
You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand.

</column>

---

You swipe at your opponent and grab at them. Make a melee Strike while keeping one hand free. If the Strike hits, you grab the target using your free hand. The creature remains [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) until the end of your next turn or until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79), whichever comes first.
name: Combat Grab
requirement: You have one hand free, and your target is within reach of that hand.
